name: Space Patrol (Rober Baca)
description:
Space Patrol is a short top down shooter built with Godot for a school proyect.  Just 2 levels to test some functionalities and game mechanics. The gameplay is similar to Nuclear Throne.

Your mission is simple and somewhat expected: kill all the enemies to open a portal to go to the next stage. Lose all your health, and you `ll have to start over.

This is my first prototype made in Godot, so expect some bugs. Not sure if I`ll continue with this game in the nearly future.

Hope you like it !
